original_title: The Guitar of John Fahey Volume 2
overview: John Fahey has created a unique body of guitar compositions and arrangements as well as a distinct approach to fingerstyle guitar. He broke fresh ground in recording guitar music that drew from such diverse sources as Country blues, Old-Time music, Indian ragas, European classical music and Gregorian chants. In this second video lesson John explains and teaches eight of his best known Instrumentals Regular, Open G (DGD GBD) and Open D (D A D F# A D) tunings are featured. 65-minutes. A detailed tab/music booklet is included as a PDF file on the DVD. DVD is region 0, playable worldwide.
title: The Guitar of John Fahey Volume 2
